title: At Least 10 Killed in Lebanon, Officials Say, After Israel Strikes Hezbollah
summary_full: The Lebanese militant group said eight of its members were among those killed late Friday. The attacks threaten to further destabilize an already tenuous cease-fire.
summary_public: The Lebanese militant group said eight of its members were among those killed late Friday. The attacks threaten to further destabilize an already tenuous cease-fire.
